title: Exploring the Effectiveness of Universal Design for Learning (UDL): Science Education Application Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Design and efficacy validation of science education courses applying UDL principles in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Apply UDL’s three core principles (engagement, representation, action & expression) to science education content
Develop UDL-based science assessment tools that accommodate diverse learning styles
Create educational materials aligned with UDL principles even in resource-constrained technological environments
Compare and analyze the effectiveness of UDL implementation cases versus traditional instructional methods

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
